summary: AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION WILL NOT SHIFT INTO 3RD OR 4TH GEAR, ANYMORE.  ROARS LOUDLY RATHER THAN SHIFTS.  WHEN I TAKE MY FOOT OFF THE ACCELERATOR AT 30+ MPH CAR ACTS LIKE CRUISE CONTROL IS ON - DECELERATES EXTREMELY SLOW.  RPMS STAY AT 2200+ AT 35 MPH.  ALSO NOW A LITTLE HIGHER ON TEMPERATURE GAUGE.  *JB
